name: Puzzle Girls: Fantasy
description:
Puzzle Girls: Fantasy is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swap tiles, in order to complete the pictured artwork.
Featuring artwork from a variety of sexy characters to play with, from a variety of fantasy and sci-fi settings.

A relaxing puzzle game to have fun with.

The base game is completely free to play and includes a series of images to puzzle your way through.

Features:

  • A selection of puzzle art to unlock and enjoy.
  • Multiple difficulty settings to make the puzzles more complex
  • Swap Tiles, Rotate tiles & flip tiles horizontally and vertically to complete the puzzles.
  • One handed gaming for easier play!
